attributes.action: Warwickshire says Cancel the Cut to Universal Credit
attributes.additional_details: Removing the boost will force more families to make decisions between putting food on the table and paying bills. Too many of our children are already living below the poverty line. Too many of our adults are already suffering from the immense stress that the threat of poverty brings. Cancel the cut to Universal Credit. Keep the lifeline that is keeping so many vulnerable families afloat.
attributes.background:
To Chancellor Rishi Sunak and Prime Minister Boris Johnson

We the undersigned urge you to reconsider the decision to remove the £20 weekly boost to Universal Credit in April 2021.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550546
